short_description: the original old mill pizza is a pizza & italian restaurant based in winfield, indiana, united states.
long_description: serving crown point and winfield great food with region roots. our menu features a diverse selection of pub food classics. book dos amigos cantina at our crown point location today. it is the perfect space for birthday parties, showers, class reunions, corporate events, holiday parties and so much more.
generated_description: old mill pizzeria & lounge is a restaurant chain located in merrillville, indiana, with additional locations in crown point and winfield. the company specializes in serving a diverse selection of pub food classics, with a notable focus on their signature old mill pizza. the restaurant offers dine-in, take-out, and delivery services, and also provides a private event space for various occasions. the crown point location features an outdoor patio, and the winfield location is situated in a building adjacent to buddy and pals on randolph street.
